analyzed: iyam viprā medha sātaye

original: RV_7,066.09a te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha /
analyzed: te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha

original: RV_7,066.09c iṣaṃ svaś ca dhīmahi //
analyzed: iṣam svar ca dhīmahi

original: RV_7,066.10a bahavaḥ sūracakṣaso 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: bahavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ agni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_7,066.10c trīṇi ye yemur vidathāni dhītibhir viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: trīṇi ye yemuḥ vidathāni dhītibhiḥ viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ

original: RV_7,066.11a vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam ād ahar yajñam aktuṃ cād ṛcam /
analyzed: vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam āt ahar yajñam aktum ca āt ṛcam

original: RV_7,066.11c anāpyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā kṣatraṃ rājāna āśata //
analyzed: an āpyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā kṣatram rājānaḥ āśata

original: RV_7,066.12a tad vo adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūra udite /
analyzed: tat vaḥ adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūre udite

original: RV_7,066.12c yad ohate varuṇo mitro aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
analyzed: yat ohate varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_7,066.13a ṛtāvāna ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdho ghorāso anṛtadviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ ṛta jātāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ghorāsaḥ anṛta dviṣaḥ

original: RV_7,066.13c teṣāṃ vaḥ sumne succhardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām vaḥ sumne su chardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_7,066.14a ud u tyad darśataṃ vapur diva eti pratihvare /
analyzed: ud u tyad darśatam vapuḥ divaḥ eti pratihvare

original: RV_7,066.14c yad īm āśur vahati deva etaśo viśvasmai cakṣase aram //
analyzed: yat īm āśuḥ vahati devaḥ etaśaḥ viśvasmai cakṣase aram

original: RV_7,066.15a śīrṣṇaḥ-śīrṣṇo jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ /
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ śīrṣṇaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣas patim samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ

original: RV_7,066.15c sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryaṃ vahanti harito rathe //
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryam vahanti haritaḥ rathe

original: RV_7,066.16a tac cakṣur devahitaṃ śukram uccarat /
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ deva hitam śukram uccarat

original: RV_7,066.16b paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam //
analyzed: paśyema śaradaḥ śatam jīvema śaradaḥ śatam

original: RV_7,066.17a kāvyebhir adābhyā yātaṃ varuṇa dyumat /
analyzed: kāvyebhiḥ adābhyā yātam varuṇa dyumat

original: RV_7,066.17c mitraś ca somapītaye //
analyzed: mitraḥ ca soma pītaye

original: RV_7,066.18a divo dhāmabhir varuṇa mitraś cā yātam adruhā /
analyzed: divaḥ dhāmabhiḥ varuṇa mitraḥ ca ā yātam adruhā

original: RV_7,066.18c pibataṃ somam ātujī //
analyzed: pibatam somam ātujī

original: RV_7,066.19a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇāv āhutiṃ narā /
analyzed: ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇau āhutim narā

original: RV_7,066.19c pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_7,067.01a prati vāṃ rathaṃ nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena /
analyzed: prati vām ratham nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena

original: RV_7,067.01c yo vāṃ dūto na dhiṣṇyāv ajīgar acchā sūnur na pitarā vivakmi //
analyzed: yaḥ vām dūtaḥ na dhiṣṇyau ajīgar acchā sūnuḥ na pitarā vivakmi

original: RV_7,067.02a aśocy agniḥ samidhāno asme upo adṛśran tamasaś cid antāḥ /
analyzed: aśoci agniḥ samidhānaḥ asme upa u adṛśran tamasaḥ cit antāḥ

original: RV_7,067.02c aceti ketur uṣasaḥ purastāc chriye divo duhitur jāyamānaḥ //
analyzed: aceti ketuḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt śriye divaḥ duhituḥ jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_7,067.03a abhi vāṃ nūnam aśvinā suhotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyā vivakvān /
analyzed: abhi vām nūnam aśvinā su hotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyāḥ vivakvān

original: RV_7,067.03c pūrvībhir yātam pathyābhir arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena //
analyzed: pūrvībhiḥ yātam pathyābhiḥ arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena

original: RV_7,067.04a avor vāṃ nūnam aśvinā yuvākur huve yad vāṃ sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ /
analyzed: vām nūnam aśvinā yuvākuḥ huve yat vām sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ

original: RV_7,067.04c ā vāṃ vahantu sthavirāso aśvāḥ pibātho asme suṣutā madhūni //
analyzed: ā vām vahantu sthavirāsaḥ aśvāḥ pibāthaḥ asme suṣutā madhūni

original: RV_7,067.05a prācīm u devāśvinā dhiyam me 'mṛdhrāṃ sātaye kṛtaṃ vasūyum /
analyzed: prācīm u devā aśvinā dhiyam me amṛdhrām sātaye kṛtam vasūyum

original: RV_7,067.05c viśvā aviṣṭaṃ vāja ā purandhīs tā naḥ śaktaṃ śacīpatī śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ aviṣṭam vāje ā purandhīḥ tāḥ naḥ śaktam śacīpatī śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,067.06a aviṣṭaṃ dhīṣv aśvinā na āsu prajāvad reto ahrayaṃ no astu /
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhīṣu aśvinā naḥ āsu prajāvat retaḥ ahrayam naḥ astu

original: RV_7,067.06c ā vāṃ toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema //
analyzed: ā vām toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ su ratnāsaḥ deva vītim gamema

original: RV_7,067.07a eṣa sya vām pūrvagatveva sakhye nidhir hito mādhvī rāto asme /
analyzed: eṣa sya vām pūrva gatvā iva sakhye nidhiḥ hitaḥ mādhvī rātaḥ asme

original: RV_7,067.07c aheḷatā manasā yātam arvāg aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu //
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā yātam arvāk aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_7,067.08a ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vāṃ sapta sravato ratho gāt /
analyzed: ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vām sapta sravataḥ rathaḥ gāt

original: RV_7,067.08c na vāyanti subhvo devayuktā ye vāṃ dhūrṣu taraṇayo vahanti //
analyzed: na vāyanti su bhvaḥ deva yuktāḥ ye vām dhūrṣu taraṇayaḥ vahanti

original: RV_7,067.09a asaścatā maghavadbhyo hi bhūtaṃ ye rāyā maghadeyaṃ junanti /
analyzed: asaścatā maghavadbhyaḥ hi bhūtam ye rāyā magha deyam junanti

original: RV_7,067.09c pra ye bandhuṃ sūnṛtābhis tirante gavyā pṛñcanto aśvyā maghāni //
analyzed: pra ye bandhum sūnṛtābhiḥ tirante gavyā pṛñcantaḥ aśvyā maghāni

original: RV_7,067.10a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
analyzed: nu me havam ā śṛṇutam yuvānā yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinau irāvat

original: RV_7,067.10c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam ratnāni jaratam ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,068.01a ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā svaśvā giro dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ /
analyzed: ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā su aśvā giraḥ dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ

original: RV_7,068.01c havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītam naḥ

original: RV_7,068.02a pra vām andhāṃsi madyāny asthur araṃ gantaṃ haviṣo vītaye me /
analyzed: pra vām andhāṃsi madyāni asthuḥ aram gantam haviṣaḥ vītaye me

original: RV_7,068.02c tiro aryo havanāni śrutaṃ naḥ //
analyzed: tiras aryaḥ havanāni śrutam naḥ

original: RV_7,068.03a pra vāṃ ratho manojavā iyarti tiro rajāṃsy aśvinā śatotiḥ /
analyzed: pra vām rathaḥ manaḥ javāḥ iyarti tiras rajāṃsi aśvinā śata ūtiḥ

original: RV_7,068.03c asmabhyaṃ sūryāvasū iyānaḥ //
analyzed: asmabhyam sūryāvasū iyānaḥ

original: RV_7,068.04a ayaṃ ha yad vāṃ devayā u adrir ūrdhvo vivakti somasud yuvabhyām /
analyzed: ayam ha yat vām deva yāḥ u adriḥ ūrdhvaḥ vivakti soma sut yuvabhyām

original: RV_7,068.04c ā valgū vipro vavṛtīta havyaiḥ //
analyzed: ā valgū vipraḥ havyaiḥ

original: RV_7,068.05a citraṃ ha yad vām bhojanaṃ nv asti ny atraye mahiṣvantaṃ yuyotam /
analyzed: citram ha yat vām bhojanam nu asti ni atraye mahiṣvantam yuyotam

original: RV_7,068.05c yo vām omānaṃ dadhate priyaḥ san //
analyzed: yaḥ vām omānam dadhate priyaḥ san

original: RV_7,068.06a uta tyad vāṃ jurate aśvinā bhūc cyavānāya pratītyaṃ havirde /
analyzed: uta tyad vām jurate aśvinā bhūt cyavānāya pratītyam haviḥ de

original: RV_7,068.06c adhi yad varpa itaūti dhatthaḥ //
analyzed: adhi yat varpaḥ itaūti dhatthaḥ

original: RV_7,068.07a uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyo madhye jahur durevāsaḥ samudre /
analyzed: uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyaḥ madhye jahuḥ durevāsaḥ samudre

original: RV_7,068.07c nir īm parṣad arāvā yo yuvākuḥ //
analyzed: niḥ īm parṣat arāvā yaḥ yuvākuḥ

original: RV_7,068.08a vṛkāya cij jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutaṃ śayave hūyamānā /
analyzed: vṛkāya cit jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutam śayave hūyamānā

original: RV_7,068.08c yāv aghnyām apinvatam apo na staryaṃ cic chakty aśvinā śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: yau aghnyām apinvatam apaḥ naḥ staryam cit śaktī aśvinā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,068.09a eṣa sya kārur jarate sūktair agre budhāna uṣasāṃ sumanmā /
analyzed: eṣa sya kāruḥ jarate sūktaiḥ agre budhānaḥ uṣasām su manmā

original: RV_7,068.09c iṣā taṃ vardhad aghnyā payobhir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: iṣā tam vardhat aghnyā payobhiḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,069.01a ā vāṃ ratho rodasī badbadhāno hiraṇyayo vṛṣabhir yātv aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ rodasī badbadhānaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yātu aśvaiḥ

original: RV_7,069.01c ghṛtavartaniḥ pavibhī rucāna iṣāṃ voḷhā nṛpatir vājinīvān //
analyzed: ghṛta vartaniḥ pavibhiḥ rucānaḥ iṣām voḷhā nṛpatiḥ vājinīvān

original: RV_7,069.02a sa paprathāno abhi pañca bhūmā trivandhuro manasā yātu yuktaḥ /
analyzed: sa paprathānaḥ abhi pañca bhūmā tri vandhuraḥ manasā yātu yuktaḥ

original: RV_7,069.02c viśo yena gacchatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmam aśvinā dadhānā //
analyzed: viśaḥ yena gacchathaḥ devayantīḥ kutra cit yāmam aśvinā dadhānā

original: RV_7,069.03a svaśvā yaśasā yātam arvāg dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ /
analyzed: su aśvā yaśasā yātam arvāk dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ

original: RV_7,069.03c vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām //
analyzed: vi vām rathaḥ vadhvā yādamānaḥ antān divaḥ bādhate vartanibhyām

original: RV_7,069.04a yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām /
analyzed: yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣā vṛṇīta sūraḥ duhitā paritakmyāyām

original: RV_7,069.04c yad devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vāṃ vayo gāt //
analyzed: yat devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vām vayaḥ gāt

original: RV_7,069.05a yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ha sya vām rathirā usrā rathaḥ yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ

original: RV_7,069.05c tena naḥ śaṃ yor uṣaso vyuṣṭau ny aśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin //
analyzed: tena naḥ śam yoḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau ni aśvinā vahatam yajñe asmin

original: RV_7,069.06a narā gaureva vidyutaṃ tṛṣāṇāsmākam adya savanopa yātam /
analyzed: narā gaurā iva vidyutam tṛṣāṇā asmākam adya savanā upa yātam

original: RV_7,069.06c purutrā hi vām matibhir havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ //
analyzed: purutrā hi vām matibhiḥ havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ

original: RV_7,069.07a yuvam bhujyum avaviddhaṃ samudra ud ūhathur arṇaso asridhānaiḥ /
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum avaviddham samudre ud ūhathuḥ arṇasaḥ a sridhānaiḥ

original: RV_7,069.07c patatribhir aśramair avyathibhir daṃsanābhir aśvinā pārayantā //
analyzed: patatribhiḥ aśramaiḥ avyathibhiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ aśvinā pārayantā

original: RV_7,069.08a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
analyzed: nu me havam ā śṛṇutam yuvānā yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinau irāvat

original: RV_7,069.08c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam ratnāni jaratam ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,070.01a ā viśvavārāśvinā gataṃ naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām /
analyzed: ā viśva vārā aśvinā gatam naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām

original: RV_7,070.01c aśvo na vājī śunapṛṣṭho asthād ā yat sedathur dhruvase na yonim //
analyzed: aśvaḥ na vājī śuna pṛṣṭhaḥ asthāt ā yat sedathuḥ dhruvase na yonim

original: RV_7,070.02a siṣakti sā vāṃ sumatiś caniṣṭhātāpi gharmo manuṣo duroṇe /
analyzed: siṣakti sā vām sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā atāpi gharmaḥ manuṣaḥ duroṇe

original: RV_7,070.02c yo vāṃ samudrān saritaḥ piparty etagvā cin na suyujā yujānaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vām samudrān saritaḥ piparti etagvā cit na su yujā yujānaḥ

original: RV_7,070.03a yāni sthānāny aśvinā dadhāthe divo yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu /
analyzed: yāni sthānāni aśvinā dadhāthe divaḥ yahvīṣu oṣadhīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_7,070.03c ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadanteṣaṃ janāya dāśuṣe vahantā //
analyzed: ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadantā iṣam janāya dāśuṣe vahantā

original: RV_7,070.04a caniṣṭaṃ devā oṣadhīṣv apsu yad yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: caniṣṭam devau oṣadhīṣu apsu yat yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,070.04c purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ny asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathur yugāni //
analyzed: purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ni asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathuḥ yugāni

original: RV_7,070.05a śuśruvāṃsā cid aśvinā purūṇy abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām /
analyzed: śuśruvāṃsā cit aśvinā purūṇi abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_7,070.05c prati pra yātaṃ varam ā janāyāsme vām astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā //
analyzed: prati pra yātam varam ā janāya asme vām astu sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā

original: RV_7,070.06a yo vāṃ yajño nāsatyā haviṣmān kṛtabrahmā samaryo bhavāti /
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñaḥ nāsatyāḥ haviṣmān kṛta brahmā samaryaḥ bhavāti

original: RV_7,070.06c upa pra yātaṃ varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇy ṛcyante yuvabhyām //
analyzed: upa pra yātam varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇi ṛcyante yuvabhyām

original: RV_7,070.07a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,070.07c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi yuvayūni agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,071.01a apa svasur uṣaso nag jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīr aruṣāya panthām /
analyzed: apa svasuḥ uṣasaḥ nak jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīḥ aruṣāya panthām

original: RV_7,071.01c aśvāmaghā gomaghā vāṃ huvema divā naktaṃ śarum asmad yuyotam //
analyzed: aśvāmaghā go maghā vām huvema divā naktam śarum asmat yuyotam

original: RV_7,071.02a upāyātaṃ dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā /
analyzed: upāyātam dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā

original: RV_7,071.02c yuyutam asmad anirām amīvāṃ divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthāṃ naḥ //
analyzed: yuyutam asmat anirām amīvām divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthām naḥ

original: RV_7,071.03a ā vāṃ ratham avamasyāṃ vyuṣṭau sumnāyavo vṛṣaṇo vartayantu /
analyzed: ā vām ratham avamasyām vyuṣṭau sumnāyavaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vartayantu

original: RV_7,071.03c syūmagabhastim ṛtayugbhir aśvair āśvinā vasumantaṃ vahethām //
analyzed: syūma gabhastim ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ āśvinā vasumantam vahethām

original: RV_7,071.04a yo vāṃ ratho nṛpatī asti voḷhā trivandhuro vasumāṃ usrayāmā /
analyzed: yaḥ vām rathaḥ nṛpatī asti voḍhā tri vandhuraḥ vasumān usra yāmā

original: RV_7,071.04c ā na enā nāsatyopa yātam abhi yad vāṃ viśvapsnyo jigāti //
analyzed: ā naḥ enā nāsatyā upa yātam abhi yat vām viśvapsnyaḥ jigāti

original: RV_7,071.05a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ jaraso 'mumuktaṃ ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam /
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam jarasaḥ amumuktam ni pedavaḥ ūhathuḥ āśum aśvam

original: RV_7,071.05c nir aṃhasas tamasa spartam atriṃ ni jāhuṣaṃ śithire dhātam antaḥ //
analyzed: niḥ aṃhasaḥ tamasaḥ spartam atrim ni jāhuṣam śithire dhātam antar

original: RV_7,071.06a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,071.06c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi yuvayūni agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,072.01a ā gomatā nāsatyā rathenāśvāvatā puruścandreṇa yātam /
analyzed: ā gomatā nāsatyā rathena aśvāvatā puru ścandreṇa yātam

original: RV_7,072.01c abhi vāṃ viśvā niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā //
analyzed: abhi vām viśvāḥ niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā

original: RV_7,072.02a ā no devebhir upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena /
analyzed: ā naḥ devebhiḥ upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena

original: RV_7,072.02c yuvor hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samāno bandhur uta tasya vittam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samānaḥ bandhuḥ uta tasya vittam

original: RV_7,072.03a ud u stomāso aśvinor abudhrañ jāmi brahmāṇy uṣasaś ca devīḥ /
analyzed: ud u stomāsaḥ aśvinoḥ abudhram jāmi brahmāṇi uṣasaḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_7,072.03c āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyeme acchā vipro nāsatyā vivakti //
analyzed: āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyā ime acchā vipraḥ nāsatyā vivakti

original: RV_7,072.04a vi ced ucchanty aśvinā uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravo bharante /
analyzed: vi ced ucchanti aśvinau uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravaḥ bharante

original: RV_7,072.04c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred bṛhad agnayaḥ samidhā jarante //
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum savitā devaḥ aśret bṛhat agnayaḥ samidhā jarante

original: RV_7,072.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt āśvinā yātam adharāt udaktāt

original: RV_7,072.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvatas pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,073.01a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati stomaṃ devayanto dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya prati stomam devayantaḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_7,073.01c purudaṃsā purutamā purājāmartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ //
analyzed: purudaṃsā purutamā purājā amartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ

original: RV_7,073.02a ny u priyo manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yo yajate vandate ca /
analyzed: ni u priyaḥ manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yaḥ yajate vandate ca

original: RV_7,073.02c aśnītam madhvo aśvinā upāka ā vāṃ voce vidatheṣu prayasvān //
analyzed: aśnītam madhvaḥ aśvinau upāke ā vām voce vidatheṣu prayasvān

original: RV_7,073.03a ahema yajñam pathām urāṇā imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: ahema yajñam pathām urāṇāḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,073.03c śruṣṭīveva preṣito vām abodhi prati stomair jaramāṇo vasiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: śruṣṭīvā iva preṣitaḥ vām abodhi prati stomaiḥ jaramāṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,073.04a upa tyā vahnī gamato viśaṃ no rakṣohaṇā sambhṛtā vīḷupāṇī /
analyzed: upa tyā vahnī gamataḥ viśam naḥ rakṣaḥ haṇā sambhṛtā vīḍu pāṇī

original: RV_7,073.04c sam andhāṃsy agmata matsarāṇi mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gataṃ śivena //
analyzed: sam andhāṃsi agmata matsarāṇi mā naḥ mardhiṣṭam ā gatam śivena

original: RV_7,073.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt āśvinā yātam adharāt udaktāt

original: RV_7,073.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvatas pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,074.01a imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā /
analyzed: imāḥ u vām diviṣṭayaḥ usrā havante aśvinā

original: RV_7,074.01c ayaṃ vām ahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃ-viśaṃ hi gacchathaḥ //
analyzed: ayam vām ahve avase śacī vasū viśam viśam hi gacchathaḥ

original: RV_7,074.02a yuvaṃ citraṃ dadathur bhojanaṃ narā codethāṃ sūnṛtāvate /
analyzed: yuvam citram dadathuḥ bhojanam narā codethām sūnṛtāvate

original: RV_7,074.02c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu //
analyzed: arvāk ratham samanasā ni yacchatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_7,074.03a ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā /
analyzed: ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_7,074.03c dugdham payo vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gatam //
analyzed: dugdham payaḥ vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā naḥ mardhiṣṭam ā gatam

original: RV_7,074.04a aśvāso ye vām upa dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ yuvāṃ dīyanti bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ ye vām upa dāśuṣaḥ gṛham yuvām dīyanti bibhrataḥ

original: RV_7,074.04c makṣūyubhir narā hayebhir aśvinā devā yātam asmayū //
analyzed: makṣūyubhiḥ narā hayebhiḥ aśvinā devā yātam asmayū

original: RV_7,074.05a adhā ha yanto aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: adhā ha yantaḥ aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_7,074.05c tā yaṃsato maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ yaśaś chardir asmabhyaṃ nāsatyā //
analyzed: tā yaṃsataḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam yaśaḥ chardiḥ asmabhyam nāsatyā

original: RV_7,074.06a pra ye yayur avṛkāso rathā iva nṛpātāro janānām /
analyzed: pra ye yayuḥ avṛkāsaḥ rathāḥ iva nṛ pātāraḥ janānām

original: RV_7,074.06c uta svena śavasā śūśuvur nara uta kṣiyanti sukṣitim //
analyzed: uta svena śavasā śūśuvuḥ naraḥ uta kṣiyanti su kṣitim

original: RV_7,075.01a vy uṣā āvo divijā ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt /
analyzed: vi uṣāḥ āvaḥ divijāḥ ṛtena āviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt

original: RV_7,075.01c apa druhas tama āvar ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyā ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: apa druhaḥ tamaḥ āvaḥ ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyāḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_7,075.02a mahe no adya suvitāya bodhy uṣo mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi /
analyzed: mahe naḥ adya suvitāya bodhi uṣaḥ mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi

original: RV_7,075.02c citraṃ rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehy asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum //
analyzed: citram rayim yaśasam dhehi asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum

original: RV_7,075.03a ete tye bhānavo darśatāyāś citrā uṣaso amṛtāsa āguḥ /
analyzed: ete tye bhānavaḥ darśatāyāḥ citrāḥ uṣasaḥ amṛtāsaḥ āguḥ

original: RV_7,075.03c janayanto daivyāni vratāny āpṛṇanto antarikṣā vy asthuḥ //
analyzed: janayantaḥ daivyāni vratāni āpṛṇantaḥ antarikṣā vi asthuḥ

original: RV_7,075.04a eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyo jigāti /
analyzed: eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyas jigāti

original: RV_7,075.04c abhipaśyantī vayunā janānāṃ divo duhitā bhuvanasya patnī //
analyzed: abhipaśyantī vayunā janānām divaḥ duhitā bhuvanasya patnī

original: RV_7,075.05a vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāya īśe vasūnām /
analyzed: vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāyaḥ īśe vasūnām

original: RV_7,075.05c ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghony uṣā ucchati vahnibhir gṛṇānā //
analyzed: ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghonī uṣāḥ ucchati vahnibhiḥ gṛṇānā

original: RV_7,075.06a prati dyutānām aruṣāso aśvāś citrā adṛśrann uṣasaṃ vahantaḥ /
analyzed: prati dyutānām aruṣāsaḥ aśvāḥ citrāḥ adṛśran uṣasam vahantaḥ

original: RV_7,075.06c yāti śubhrā viśvapiśā rathena dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //
analyzed: yāti śubhrā viśva piśā rathena dadhāti ratnam vidhate janāya

original: RV_7,075.07a satyā satyebhir mahatī mahadbhir devī devebhir yajatā yajatraiḥ /
analyzed: satyā satyebhiḥ mahatī mahadbhiḥ devī devebhiḥ yajatā yajatraiḥ

original: RV_7,075.07c rujad dṛḷhāni dadad usriyāṇām prati gāva uṣasaṃ vāvaśanta //
analyzed: rujat dṛḷhāni dadat usriyāṇām prati gāvaḥ uṣasam vāvaśanta

original: RV_7,075.08a nū no gomad vīravad dhehi ratnam uṣo aśvāvat purubhojo asme /
analyzed: nu naḥ gomat vīravat dhehi ratnam uṣaḥ aśvāvat puru bhojaḥ asme

original: RV_7,075.08c mā no barhiḥ puruṣatā nide kar yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ barhiḥ puruṣa tā nide kaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,076.01a ud u jyotir amṛtaṃ viśvajanyaṃ viśvānaraḥ savitā devo aśret /
analyzed: ud u jyotiḥ amṛtam viśvajanyam viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ aśret

original: RV_7,076.01c kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣur āvir akar bhuvanaṃ viśvam uṣāḥ //
analyzed: kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣuḥ āvis akaḥ bhuvanam viśvam uṣāḥ

original: RV_7,076.02a pra me panthā devayānā adṛśrann amardhanto vasubhir iṣkṛtāsaḥ /
analyzed: pra me panthāḥ deva yānāḥ adṛśran a mardhantaḥ vasubhiḥ iṣkṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_7,076.02c abhūd u ketur uṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcy āgād adhi harmyebhyaḥ //
analyzed: abhūt u ketuḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcī āgāt adhi harmyebhyaḥ

original: RV_7,076.03a tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya /
analyzed: tāni id ahāni bahulāni āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya

original: RV_7,076.03c yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty uṣo dadṛkṣe na punar yatīva //
analyzed: yatas pari jāre iva ācarantī uṣaḥ dadṛkṣe na punar yatī iva

original: RV_7,076.04a ta id devānāṃ sadhamāda āsann ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ /
analyzed: te id devānām sadhamādaḥ āsan ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ

original: RV_7,076.04c gūḷhaṃ jyotiḥ pitaro anv avindan satyamantrā ajanayann uṣāsam //
analyzed: gūḍham jyotiḥ pitaraḥ anu avindan satya mantrāḥ ajanayan uṣāsam

original: RV_7,076.05a samāna ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ saṃ jānate na yatante mithas te /
analyzed: samāne ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ sam jānate na yatante mithas te

original: RV_7,076.05c te devānāṃ na minanti vratāny amardhanto vasubhir yādamānāḥ //
analyzed: te devānām na minanti vratāni a mardhantaḥ vasubhiḥ yādamānāḥ

original: RV_7,076.06a prati tvā stomair īḷate vasiṣṭhā uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: prati tvā stomaiḥ īḍate vasiṣṭhāḥ uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ

original: RV_7,076.06c gavāṃ netrī vājapatnī na ucchoṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva //
analyzed: gavām netrī vāja patnī naḥ uccha uṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva

original: RV_7,076.07a eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānām uṣā ucchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ /
analyzed: eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānām uṣāḥ ucchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ

original: RV_7,076.07c dīrghaśrutaṃ rayim asme dadhānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dīrgha śrutam rayim asme dadhānāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,077.01a upo ruruce yuvatir na yoṣā viśvaṃ jīvam prasuvantī carāyai /
analyzed: upa u ruruce yuvatiḥ na yoṣā viśvam jīvam prasuvantī carāyai

original: RV_7,077.01c abhūd agniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇām akar jyotir bādhamānā tamāṃsi //
analyzed: abhūt agniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇām akaḥ jyotiḥ bādhamānā tamāṃsi

original: RV_7,077.02a viśvam pratīcī saprathā ud asthād ruśad vāso bibhratī śukram aśvait /
analyzed: viśvam pratīcī saprathāḥ ud asthāt ruśat vāsaḥ bibhratī śukram aśvait

original: RV_7,077.02c hiraṇyavarṇā sudṛśīkasaṃdṛg gavām mātā netry ahnām aroci //
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇā su dṛśīka saṃdṛś gavām mātā netrī ahnām aroci

original: RV_7,077.03a devānāṃ cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetaṃ nayantī sudṛśīkam aśvam /
analyzed: devānām cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetam nayantī su dṛśīkam aśvam

original: RV_7,077.03c uṣā adarśi raśmibhir vyaktā citrāmaghā viśvam anu prabhūtā //
analyzed: uṣāḥ adarśi raśmibhiḥ vyaktā citrāmaghā viśvam anu prabhūtā

original: RV_7,077.04a antivāmā dūre amitram ucchorvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ kṛdhī naḥ /
analyzed: antivāmā dūre amitram uccha urvīm gavyūtim abhayam kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_7,077.04c yāvaya dveṣa ā bharā vasūni codaya rādho gṛṇate maghoni //
analyzed: yāvaya dveṣaḥ ā bhara vasūni codaya rādhaḥ gṛṇate maghoni

original: RV_7,077.05a asme śreṣṭhebhir bhānubhir vi bhāhy uṣo devi pratirantī na āyuḥ /
analyzed: asme śreṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ vi bhāhi uṣaḥ devi pratirantī naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_7,077.05c iṣaṃ ca no dadhatī viśvavāre gomad aśvāvad rathavac ca rādhaḥ //
analyzed: iṣam ca naḥ dadhatī viśva vāre gomat aśvāvat rathavat ca rādhaḥ

original: RV_7,077.06a yāṃ tvā divo duhitar vardhayanty uṣaḥ sujāte matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: yām tvā divaḥ duhitar vardhayanti uṣaḥ sujāte matibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,077.06c sāsmāsu dhā rayim ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: sā asmāsu dhāḥ rayim ṛṣvam bṛhantam yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,078.01a prati ketavaḥ prathamā adṛśrann ūrdhvā asyā añjayo vi śrayante /
analyzed: prati ketavaḥ prathamāḥ adṛśran ūrdhvāḥ asyāḥ añjayaḥ vi śrayante

original: RV_7,078.01c uṣo arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmam asmabhyaṃ vakṣi //
analyzed: uṣaḥ arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmam asmabhyam vakṣi

original: RV_7,078.02a prati ṣīm agnir jarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāso matibhir gṛṇantaḥ /
analyzed: prati sīm agniḥ jarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_7,078.02c uṣā yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritāpa devī //
analyzed: uṣāḥ yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritā apa devī

original: RV_7,078.03a etā u tyāḥ praty adṛśran purastāj jyotir yacchantīr uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ u tyāḥ prati adṛśran purastāt jyotiḥ yacchantīḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_7,078.03c ajījanan sūryaṃ yajñam agnim apācīnaṃ tamo agād ajuṣṭam //
analyzed: ajījanan sūryam yajñam agnim apācīnam tamaḥ agāt ajuṣṭam

original: RV_7,078.04a aceti divo duhitā maghonī viśve paśyanty uṣasaṃ vibhātīm /
analyzed: aceti divaḥ duhitā maghonī viśve paśyanti uṣasam vibhātīm

original: RV_7,078.04c āsthād rathaṃ svadhayā yujyamānam ā yam aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahanti //
analyzed: āsthāt ratham svadhayā yujyamānam ā yam aśvāsaḥ su yujaḥ vahanti

original: RV_7,078.05a prati tvādya sumanaso budhantāsmākāso maghavāno vayaṃ ca /
analyzed: prati tvā adya sumanasaḥ budhanta asmākāsaḥ maghavānaḥ vayam ca

original: RV_7,078.05c tilvilāyadhvam uṣaso vibhātīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: tilvilāyadhvam uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,079.01a vy uṣā āvaḥ pathyā janānām pañca kṣitīr mānuṣīr bodhayantī /
analyzed: vi uṣāḥ āvaḥ pathyāḥ janānām pañca kṣitīḥ mānuṣīḥ bodhayantī

original: RV_7,079.01c susaṃdṛgbhir ukṣabhir bhānum aśred vi sūryo rodasī cakṣasāvaḥ //
analyzed: su saṃdṛgbhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ bhānum aśret vi sūryaḥ rodasī cakṣasā avaḥ

original: RV_7,079.02a vy añjate divo anteṣv aktūn viśo na yuktā uṣaso yatante /
analyzed: vi añjate divaḥ anteṣu aktūn viśaḥ na yuktāḥ uṣasaḥ yatante

original: RV_7,079.02c saṃ te gāvas tama ā vartayanti jyotir yacchanti saviteva bāhū //
analyzed: sam te gāvaḥ tamaḥ ā vartayanti jyotiḥ yacchanti savitā iva bāhū

original: RV_7,079.03a abhūd uṣā indratamā maghony ajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi /
analyzed: abhūt uṣāḥ indratamā maghonī ajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi

original: RV_7,079.03c vi divo devī duhitā dadhāty aṅgirastamā sukṛte vasūni //
analyzed: vi divaḥ devī duhitā dadhāti aṅgirastamā su kṛte vasūni

original: RV_7,079.04a tāvad uṣo rādho asmabhyaṃ rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyo arado gṛṇānā /
analyzed: tāvat uṣaḥ rādhaḥ asmabhyam rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyaḥ aradaḥ gṛṇānā

original: RV_7,079.04c yāṃ tvā jajñur vṛṣabhasyā raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duro adrer aurṇoḥ //
analyzed: yām tvā jajñuḥ vṛṣabhasya raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duraḥ adreḥ aurṇoḥ

original: RV_7,079.05a devaṃ-devaṃ rādhase codayanty asmadryak sūnṛtā īrayantī /
analyzed: devam devam rādhase codayantī asmadryak sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī

original: RV_7,079.05c vyucchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vyucchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyaḥ dhāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,080.01a prati stomebhir uṣasaṃ vasiṣṭhā gīrbhir viprāsaḥ prathamā abudhran /
analyzed: prati stomebhiḥ uṣasam vasiṣṭhāḥ gīrbhiḥ viprāsaḥ prathamāḥ abudhran

original: RV_7,080.01c vivartayantīṃ rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīm bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: vivartayantīm rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīm bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_7,080.02a eṣā syā navyam āyur dadhānā gūḍhvī tamo jyotiṣoṣā abodhi /
analyzed: eṣā syā navyam āyuḥ dadhānā gūḍhvī tamaḥ jyotiṣā uṣāḥ abodhi

original: RV_7,080.02c agra eti yuvatir ahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryaṃ yajñam agnim //
analyzed: agre eti yuvatiḥ ahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryam yajñam agnim

original: RV_7,080.03a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ

original: RV_7,080.03c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,081.01a praty u adarśy āyaty ucchantī duhitā divaḥ /
analyzed: prati u adarśi āyatī ucchantī duhitā divaḥ

original: RV_7,081.01c apo mahi vyayati cakṣase tamo jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī //
analyzed: apa u mahi vyayati cakṣase tamaḥ jyotiḥ kṛṇoti sūnarī

original: RV_7,081.02a ud usriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacāṃ udyan nakṣatram arcivat /
analyzed: ud usriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacā udyan nakṣatram arcivat

original: RV_7,081.02c taved uṣo vyuṣi sūryasya ca sam bhaktena gamemahi //
analyzed: tava id uṣaḥ vyuṣi sūryasya ca sam bhaktena gamemahi

original: RV_7,081.03a prati tvā duhitar diva uṣo jīrā abhutsmahi /
analyzed: prati tvā duhitar divaḥ uṣaḥ jīrāḥ abhutsmahi

original: RV_7,081.03c yā vahasi puru spārhaṃ vananvati ratnaṃ na dāśuṣe mayaḥ //
analyzed: yā vahasi puru spārham vananvati ratnam na dāśuṣe mayaḥ

original: RV_7,081.04a ucchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi prakhyai devi svar dṛśe /
analyzed: ucchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi prakhyai devi svar dṛśe

original: RV_7,081.04c tasyās te ratnabhāja īmahe vayaṃ syāma mātur na sūnavaḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ te ratna bhājaḥ īmahe vayam syāma mātuḥ na sūnavaḥ

original: RV_7,081.05a tac citraṃ rādha ā bharoṣo yad dīrghaśruttamam /
analyzed: tat citram rādhaḥ ā bhara uṣaḥ yat dīrghaśruttamam

original: RV_7,081.05c yat te divo duhitar martabhojanaṃ tad rāsva bhunajāmahai //
analyzed: yat te divaḥ duhitar marta bhojanam tat rāsva bhunajāmahai

original: RV_7,081.06a śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanaṃ vājāṃ asmabhyaṃ gomataḥ /
analyzed: śravaḥ sūribhyaḥ amṛtam vasutvanam vājām asmabhyam gomataḥ

original: RV_7,081.06c codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvaty uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvatī uṣāḥ ucchat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_7,082.01a indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya no viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya naḥ viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam

original: RV_7,082.01c dīrghaprayajyum ati yo vanuṣyati vayaṃ jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ //
analyzed: dīrgha prayajyum ati yaḥ vanuṣyati vayam jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_7,082.02a samrāḷ anyaḥ svarāḷ anya ucyate vām mahāntāv indrāvaruṇā mahāvasū /
analyzed: samrāj anyaḥ svarāj anyaḥ ucyate vām mahāntau indrāvaruṇā mahā vasū

original: RV_7,082.02c viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani saṃ vām ojo vṛṣaṇā sam balaṃ dadhuḥ //
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani sam vām ojaḥ vṛṣaṇā sam balam

original: RV_7,082.03a anv apāṃ khāny atṛntam ojasā sūryam airayataṃ divi prabhum /
analyzed: anu apām khāni atṛntam ojasā sūryam airayatam divi prabhum

original: RV_7,082.03c indrāvaruṇā made asya māyino 'pinvatam apitaḥ pinvataṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā made asya māyinaḥ apinvatam apitaḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_7,082.04a yuvām id yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayo yuvāṃ kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ /
analyzed: yuvām id yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayaḥ yuvām kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ

original: RV_7,082.04c īśānā vasva ubhayasya kārava indrāvaruṇā suhavā havāmahe //
analyzed: īśānā vasvaḥ ubhayasya kāravaḥ indrāvaruṇā su havā havāmahe

original: RV_7,082.05a indrāvaruṇā yad imāni cakrathur viśvā jātāni bhuvanasya majmanā /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā yat imāni cakrathuḥ viśvā jātāni bhuvanasya majmanā

original: RV_7,082.05c kṣemeṇa mitro varuṇaṃ duvasyati marudbhir ugraḥ śubham anya īyate //
analyzed: kṣemeṇa mitraḥ varuṇam duvasyati marudbhiḥ ugraḥ śubham anyaḥ īyate

original: RV_7,082.06a mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣa ojo mimāte dhruvam asya yat svam /
analyzed: mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣe ojaḥ mimāte dhruvam asya yat svam

original: RV_7,082.06c ajāmim anyaḥ śnathayantam ātirad dabhrebhir anyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ //
analyzed: ajāmim anyaḥ śnathayantam ātirat dabhrebhiḥ anyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ

original: RV_7,082.07a na tam aṃho na duritāni martyam indrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutaś cana /
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ na duritāni martyam indrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutas cana

original: RV_7,082.07c yasya devā gacchatho vītho adhvaraṃ na tam martasya naśate parihvṛtiḥ //
analyzed: yasya devā gacchathaḥ vīthaḥ adhvaram na tam martasya naśate parihvṛtiḥ

original: RV_7,082.08a arvāṅ narā daivyenāvasā gataṃ śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yadi me jujoṣathaḥ /
analyzed: arvāk narā daivyena avasā gatam śṛṇutam havam yadi me jujoṣathaḥ

original: RV_7,082.08c yuvor hi sakhyam uta vā yad āpyam mārḍīkam indrāvaruṇā ni yacchatam //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi sakhyam uta vā yat āpyam mārḍīkam indrāvaruṇā ni yacchatam

original: RV_7,082.09a asmākam indrāvaruṇā bhare-bhare puroyodhā bhavataṃ kṛṣṭyojasā /
analyzed: asmākam indrāvaruṇā bharebhare puroyodhā bhavatam kṛṣṭi ojasā

original: RV_7,082.09c yad vāṃ havanta ubhaye adha spṛdhi naras tokasya tanayasya sātiṣu //
analyzed: yat vām havante ubhaye adha spṛdhi naraḥ tokasya tanayasya sātiṣu

original: RV_7,082.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ /
analyzed: asme indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā dyumnam yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_7,082.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe //
analyzed: avadhram jyotiḥ aditeḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devasya ślokam savituḥ manāmahe

original: RV_7,083.01a yuvāṃ narā paśyamānāsa āpyam prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthuparśavo yayuḥ /
analyzed: yuvām narā paśyamānāsaḥ āpyam prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthu parśavaḥ yayuḥ

original: RV_7,083.01c dāsā ca vṛtrā hatam āryāṇi ca sudāsam indrāvaruṇāvasāvatam //
analyzed: dāsā ca vṛtrā hatam āryāṇi ca sudāsam indrāvaruṇā avasā avatam

original: RV_7,083.02a yatrā naraḥ samayante kṛtadhvajo yasminn ājā bhavati kiṃ cana priyam /
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ kṛta dhvajaḥ yasmin ājā bhavati kim cana priyam

original: RV_7,083.02c yatrā bhayante bhuvanā svardṛśas tatrā na indrāvaruṇādhi vocatam //
analyzed: yatrā bhayante bhuvanā svar dṛśaḥ tatrā naḥ indrāvaruṇā adhi vocatam

original: RV_7,083.03a sam bhūmyā antā dhvasirā adṛkṣatendrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣa āruhat /
analyzed: sam bhūmyāḥ antāḥ dhvasirāḥ adṛkṣata indrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣaḥ āruhat

original: RV_7,083.03c asthur janānām upa mām arātayo 'rvāg avasā havanaśrutā gatam //
analyzed: asthuḥ janānām upa mām arātayaḥ arvāk avasā havana śrutā gatam

original: RV_7,083.04a indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhir aprati bhedaṃ vanvantā pra sudāsam āvatam /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhiḥ aprati bhedam vanvantā pra sudāsam āvatam

original: RV_7,083.04c brahmāṇy eṣāṃ śṛṇutaṃ havīmani satyā tṛtsūnām abhavat purohitiḥ //
analyzed: brahmāṇi eṣām śṛṇutam havīmani satyā tṛtsūnām abhavat purohitiḥ

original: RV_7,083.05a indrāvaruṇāv abhy ā tapanti māghāny aryo vanuṣām arātayaḥ /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇau abhī ā tapanti mā aghāni aryaḥ vanuṣām arātayaḥ

original: RV_7,083.05c yuvaṃ hi vasva ubhayasya rājatho 'dha smā no 'vatam pārye divi //
analyzed: yuvam hi vasvaḥ ubhayasya rājathaḥ adha smā naḥ avatam pārye divi

original: RV_7,083.06a yuvāṃ havanta ubhayāsa ājiṣv indraṃ ca vasvo varuṇaṃ ca sātaye /
analyzed: yuvām havante ubhayāsaḥ ājiṣu indram ca vasvaḥ varuṇam ca sātaye

original: RV_7,083.06c yatra rājabhir daśabhir nibādhitam pra sudāsam āvataṃ tṛtsubhiḥ saha //
analyzed: yatra rājabhiḥ daśabhiḥ nibādhitam pra sudāsam āvatam tṛtsubhiḥ saha

original: RV_7,083.07a daśa rājānaḥ samitā ayajyavaḥ sudāsam indrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ /
analyzed: daśa rājānaḥ samitāḥ ayajyavaḥ sudāsam indrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ

original: RV_7,083.07c satyā nṛṇām admasadām upastutir devā eṣām abhavan devahūtiṣu //
analyzed: satyā nṛṇām admasadām upastutiḥ devāḥ eṣām abhavan deva hūtiṣu

original: RV_7,083.08a dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvataḥ sudāsa indrāvaruṇāv aśikṣatam /
analyzed: dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvatas sudāse indrāvaruṇau aśikṣatam

original: RV_7,083.08c śvityañco yatra namasā kapardino dhiyā dhīvanto asapanta tṛtsavaḥ //
analyzed: śvityañcaḥ yatra namasā kapardinaḥ dhiyā dhīvantaḥ asapanta tṛtsavaḥ

original: RV_7,083.09a vṛtrāṇy anyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratāny anyo abhi rakṣate sadā /
analyzed: vṛtrāṇi anyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratāni anyaḥ abhi rakṣate sadā

original: RV_7,083.09c havāmahe vāṃ vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhir asme indrāvaruṇā śarma yacchatam //
analyzed: havāmahe vām vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhiḥ asme indrāvaruṇā śarma yacchatam

original: RV_7,083.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ /
analyzed: asme indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā dyumnam yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_7,083.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe //
analyzed: avadhram jyotiḥ aditeḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devasya ślokam savituḥ manāmahe

original: RV_7,084.01a ā vāṃ rājānāv adhvare vavṛtyāṃ havyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
analyzed: ā vām rājānau adhvare vavṛtyām havyebhiḥ indrāvaruṇāḥ namobhiḥ

original: RV_7,084.01c pra vāṃ ghṛtācī bāhvor dadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti //
analyzed: pra vām ghṛtācī bāhvoḥ dadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti

original: RV_7,084.02a yuvo rāṣṭram bṛhad invati dyaur yau setṛbhir arajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ /
analyzed: yuvoḥ rāṣṭram bṛhat invati dyauḥ yau setṛbhiḥ a rajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ

original: RV_7,084.02c pari no heḷo varuṇasya vṛjyā uruṃ na indraḥ kṛṇavad u lokam //
analyzed: pari naḥ heḍaḥ varuṇasya vṛjyāḥ urum naḥ indraḥ kṛṇavat u lokam

original: RV_7,084.03a kṛtaṃ no yajñaṃ vidatheṣu cāruṃ kṛtam brahmāṇi sūriṣu praśastā /
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ yajñam vidatheṣu cārum kṛtam brahmāṇi sūriṣu praśastā

original: RV_7,084.03c upo rayir devajūto na etu pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tiretam //
analyzed: upa u rayiḥ deva jūtaḥ naḥ etu pra naḥ spārhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ tiretam

original: RV_7,084.04a asme indrāvaruṇā viśvavāraṃ rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantam purukṣum /
analyzed: asme indrāvaruṇāḥ viśva vāram rayim dhattam vasumantam purukṣum

original: RV_7,084.04c pra ya ādityo anṛtā mināty amitā śūro dayate vasūni //
analyzed: pra yaḥ ādityaḥ anṛtā mināti amitā śūraḥ dayate vasūni

original: RV_7,084.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā /
analyzed: iyam indram varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā

original: RV_7,084.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: su ratnāsaḥ deva vītim gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,085.01a punīṣe vām arakṣasam manīṣāṃ somam indrāya varuṇāya juhvat /
analyzed: punīṣe vām arakṣasam manīṣām somam indrāya varuṇāya juhvat

original: RV_7,085.01c ghṛtapratīkām uṣasaṃ na devīṃ tā no yāmann uruṣyatām abhīke //
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkām uṣasam na devīm tāḥ naḥ yāman uruṣyatām abhīke

original: RV_7,085.02a spardhante vā u devahūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti /
analyzed: spardhante vai u deva hūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti

original: RV_7,085.02c yuvaṃ tāṃ indrāvaruṇāv amitrān hatam parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ //
analyzed: yuvam tām indrāvaruṇau amitrān hatam parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ

original: RV_7,085.03a āpaś cid dhi svayaśasaḥ sadassu devīr indraṃ varuṇaṃ devatā dhuḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ cit hi sva yaśasaḥ sadassu devīḥ indram varuṇam devatāḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_7,085.03c kṛṣṭīr anyo dhārayati praviktā vṛtrāṇy anyo apratīni hanti //
analyzed: kṛṣṭīḥ anyaḥ dhārayati praviktāḥ vṛtrāṇi anyaḥ apratīni hanti

original: RV_7,085.04a sa sukratur ṛtacid astu hotā ya āditya śavasā vāṃ namasvān /
analyzed: sa sukratuḥ ṛta cit astu hotā yaḥ āditya śavasā vām namasvān

original: RV_7,085.04c āvavartad avase vāṃ haviṣmān asad it sa suvitāya prayasvān //
analyzed: āvavartat avase vām haviṣmān asat id sa suvitāya prayasvān

original: RV_7,085.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā /
analyzed: iyam indram varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā

original: RV_7,085.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: su ratnāsaḥ deva vītim gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,086.01a dhīrā tv asya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yas tastambha rodasī cid urvī /
analyzed: dhīrā tu asya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yaḥ tastambha rodasī cit urvī

original: RV_7,086.01c pra nākam ṛṣvaṃ nunude bṛhantaṃ dvitā nakṣatram paprathac ca bhūma //
analyzed: pra nākam ṛṣvam nunude bṛhantam dvitā nakṣatram paprathat ca bhūma

original: RV_7,086.02a uta svayā tanvā saṃ vade tat kadā nv antar varuṇe bhuvāni /
analyzed: uta svayā tanvā sam vade tat kadā nu antar varuṇe bhuvāni

original: RV_7,086.02c kim me havyam ahṛṇāno juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkaṃ sumanā abhi khyam //
analyzed: kim me havyam a hṛṇānaḥ juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkam sumanāḥ abhi khyam

original: RV_7,086.03a pṛcche tad eno varuṇa didṛkṣūpo emi cikituṣo vipṛccham /
analyzed: pṛcche tat enaḥ varuṇa didṛkṣu upa u emi cikituṣaḥ vipṛccham

original: RV_7,086.03c samānam in me kavayaś cid āhur ayaṃ ha tubhyaṃ varuṇo hṛṇīte //
analyzed: samānam id me kavayaḥ cit āhuḥ ayam ha tubhyam varuṇaḥ hṛṇīte

original: RV_7,086.04a kim āga āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ yat stotāraṃ jighāṃsasi sakhāyam /
analyzed: kim āgaḥ āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭham yat stotāram jighāṃsasi sakhāyam

original: RV_7,086.04c pra tan me voco dūḷabha svadhāvo 'va tvānenā namasā tura iyām //
analyzed: pra tat me vocaḥ dūḍabha svadhāvas ava tvā anena namasā turaḥ iyām

original: RV_7,086.05a ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛjā no 'va yā vayaṃ cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ /
analyzed: ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛja naḥ ava yā vayam cakṛma tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_7,086.05c ava rājan paśutṛpaṃ na tāyuṃ sṛjā vatsaṃ na dāmno vasiṣṭham //
analyzed: ava rājan paśutṛpam na tāyum sṛja vatsam na dāmnaḥ vasiṣṭham

original: RV_7,086.06a na sa svo dakṣo varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyur vibhīdako acittiḥ /
analyzed: na sa svaḥ dakṣaḥ varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyuḥ vibhīdakaḥ acittiḥ

original: RV_7,086.06c asti jyāyān kanīyasa upāre svapnaś caned anṛtasya prayotā //
analyzed: asti jyāyān kanīyasaḥ upāre svapnaḥ cana id anṛtasya prayotā

original: RV_7,086.07a araṃ dāso na mīḷhuṣe karāṇy ahaṃ devāya bhūrṇaye 'nāgāḥ /
analyzed: aram dāsaḥ na mīḍhuṣe karāṇi aham devāya bhūrṇaye anāgāḥ

original: RV_7,086.07c acetayad acito devo aryo gṛtsaṃ rāye kavitaro junāti //
analyzed: acetayat acitaḥ devaḥ aryaḥ gṛtsam rāye kavitaraḥ junāti

original: RV_7,086.08a ayaṃ su tubhyaṃ varuṇa svadhāvo hṛdi stoma upaśritaś cid astu /
analyzed: ayam su tubhyam varuṇa svadhāvas hṛdi stomaḥ upaśritaḥ cit astu

original: RV_7,086.08c śaṃ naḥ kṣeme śam u yoge no astu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ kṣeme śam u yoge naḥ astu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,087.01a radat patho varuṇaḥ sūryāya prārṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām /
analyzed: radat pathaḥ varuṇaḥ sūryāya pra arṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām

original: RV_7,087.01c sargo na sṛṣṭo arvatīr ṛtāyañ cakāra mahīr avanīr ahabhyaḥ //
analyzed: sargaḥ na sṛṣṭaḥ arvatīḥ ṛtāyam cakāra mahīḥ avanīḥ ahabhyaḥ

original: RV_7,087.02a ātmā te vāto raja ā navīnot paśur na bhūrṇir yavase sasavān /
analyzed: ātmā te vātaḥ rajaḥ ā navīnot paśuḥ na bhūrṇiḥ yavase sasavān

original: RV_7,087.02c antar mahī bṛhatī rodasīme viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi //
analyzed: antar mahī bṛhatī rodasī ime viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi

original: RV_7,087.03a pari spaśo varuṇasya smadiṣṭā ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke /
analyzed: pari spaśaḥ varuṇasya smadiṣṭāḥ ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke

original: RV_7,087.03c ṛtāvānaḥ kavayo yajñadhīrāḥ pracetaso ya iṣayanta manma //
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ yajña dhīrāḥ pracetasaḥ ye iṣayanta manma

original: RV_7,087.04a uvāca me varuṇo medhirāya triḥ sapta nāmāghnyā bibharti /
analyzed: uvāca me varuṇaḥ medhirāya tris sapta nāma aghnyā bibharti

original: RV_7,087.04c vidvān padasya guhyā na vocad yugāya vipra uparāya śikṣan //
analyzed: vidvān padasya guhyā na vocat yugāya vipraḥ uparāya śikṣan

original: RV_7,087.05a tisro dyāvo nihitā antar asmin tisro bhūmīr uparāḥ ṣaḍvidhānāḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ dyāvaḥ nihitāḥ antar asmin tisraḥ bhūmīḥ uparāḥ ṣaṣ vidhānāḥ

original: RV_7,087.05c gṛtso rājā varuṇaś cakra etaṃ divi preṅkhaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śubhe kam //
analyzed: gṛtsaḥ rājā varuṇaḥ cakre etam divi preṅkham hiraṇyayam śubhe kam

original: RV_7,087.06a ava sindhuṃ varuṇo dyaur iva sthād drapso na śveto mṛgas tuviṣmān /
analyzed: ava sindhum varuṇaḥ dyauḥ iva sthāt drapsaḥ na śvetaḥ mṛgaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_7,087.06c gambhīraśaṃso rajaso vimānaḥ supārakṣatraḥ sato asya rājā //
analyzed: gambhīra śaṃsaḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ su pāra kṣatraḥ sataḥ asya rājā

original: RV_7,087.07a yo mṛḷayāti cakruṣe cid āgo vayaṃ syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ mṛḍayāti cakruṣe cit āgaḥ vayam syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ

original: RV_7,087.07c anu vratāny aditer ṛdhanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: anu vratāni aditeḥ ṛdhantaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,088.01a pra śundhyuvaṃ varuṇāya preṣṭhām matiṃ vasiṣṭha mīḷhuṣe bharasva /
analyzed: pra śundhyuvam varuṇāya preṣṭhām matim vasiṣṭha mīḍhuṣe bharasva

original: RV_7,088.01c ya īm arvāñcaṃ karate yajatraṃ sahasrāmaghaṃ vṛṣaṇam bṛhantam //
analyzed: yaḥ īm arvāñcam karate yajatram sahasrāmagham vṛṣaṇam bṛhantam

original: RV_7,088.02a adhā nv asya saṃdṛśaṃ jaganvān agner anīkaṃ varuṇasya maṃsi /
analyzed: adhā nu asya saṃdṛśam jaganvān agneḥ anīkam varuṇasya maṃsi

original: RV_7,088.02c svar yad aśmann adhipā u andho 'bhi mā vapur dṛśaye ninīyāt //
analyzed: svar yat aśman adhipāḥ u andhaḥ abhi mā vapuḥ dṛśaye ninīyāt

original: RV_7,088.03a ā yad ruhāva varuṇaś ca nāvam pra yat samudram īrayāva madhyam /
analyzed: ā yat ruhāva varuṇaḥ ca nāvam pra yat samudram īrayāva madhyam

original: RV_7,088.03c adhi yad apāṃ snubhiś carāva pra preṅkha īṅkhayāvahai śubhe kam //
analyzed: adhi yat apām snubhiḥ carāva pra preṅkhe īṅkhayāvahai śubhe kam

original: RV_7,088.04a vasiṣṭhaṃ ha varuṇo nāvy ādhād ṛṣiṃ cakāra svapā mahobhiḥ /
analyzed: vasiṣṭham ha varuṇaḥ nāvi ādhāt ṛṣim cakāra su apāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_7,088.04c stotāraṃ vipraḥ sudinatve ahnāṃ yān nu dyāvas tatanan yād uṣāsaḥ //
analyzed: stotāram vipraḥ sudina tve ahnām yāt nu dyāvaḥ tatanan yāt uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_7,088.05a kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yad avṛkam purā cit /
analyzed: kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yat avṛkam purā cit

original: RV_7,088.05c bṛhantam mānaṃ varuṇa svadhāvaḥ sahasradvāraṃ jagamā gṛhaṃ te //
analyzed: bṛhantam mānam varuṇa svadhāvas sahasra dvāram jagama gṛham te

original: RV_7,088.06a ya āpir nityo varuṇa priyaḥ san tvām āgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te /
analyzed: yaḥ āpiḥ nityaḥ varuṇa priyaḥ san tvām āgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te

original: RV_7,088.06c mā ta enasvanto yakṣin bhujema yandhi ṣmā vipra stuvate varūtham //
analyzed: mā te enasvantaḥ yakṣin bhujema yandhi sma vipra stuvate varūtham

original: RV_7,088.07a dhruvāsu tvāsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyanto vy asmat pāśaṃ varuṇo mumocat /
analyzed: dhruvāsu tvā āsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyantaḥ vi asmat pāśam varuṇaḥ mumocat

original: RV_7,088.07c avo vanvānā aditer upasthād yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: avaḥ vanvānāḥ aditeḥ upasthāt yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,089.01a mo ṣu varuṇa mṛnmayaṃ gṛhaṃ rājann ahaṃ gamam /
analyzed: mā u su varuṇa mṛd mayam gṛham rājan aham gamam

original: RV_7,089.01c mṛḷā sukṣatra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: mṛḷa su kṣatra mṛḍaya

original: RV_7,089.02a yad emi prasphurann iva dṛtir na dhmāto adrivaḥ /
analyzed: yat emi prasphuran iva dṛtiḥ na dhmātaḥ adrivas

original: RV_7,089.02c mṛḷā sukṣatra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: mṛḷa su kṣatra mṛḍaya

original: RV_7,089.03a kratvaḥ samaha dīnatā pratīpaṃ jagamā śuce /
analyzed: kratvaḥ samaha dīna tā pratīpam jagama śuce

original: RV_7,089.03c mṛḷā sukṣatra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: mṛḷa su kṣatra mṛḍaya

original: RV_7,089.04a apām madhye tasthivāṃsaṃ tṛṣṇāvidaj jaritāram /
analyzed: apām madhye tasthivāṃsam tṛṣṇā vidat jaritāram

original: RV_7,089.04c mṛḷā sukṣatra mṛḷaya //
analyzed: mṛḷa su kṣatra mṛḍaya

original: RV_7,089.05a yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidroham manuṣyāś carāmasi /
analyzed: yat kim ca idam varuṇa daivye jane abhidroham manuṣyāḥ carāmasi

original: RV_7,089.05c acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ //
analyzed: acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā naḥ tasmāt enasaḥ deva rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_7,090.01a pra vīrayā śucayo dadrire vām adhvaryubhir madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ /
analyzed: pra vīrayā śucayaḥ dadrire vām adhvaryubhiḥ madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ

original: RV_7,090.01c vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy acchā pibā sutasyāndhaso madāya //
analyzed: vaha vāyo niyutaḥ yāhi acchā piba sutasya andhasaḥ madāya

original: RV_7,090.02a īśānāya prahutiṃ yas ta ānaṭ chuciṃ somaṃ śucipās tubhyaṃ vāyo /
analyzed: īśānāya prahutim yaḥ te ānaṭ śucim somam śuci pāḥ tubhyam vāyo

original: RV_7,090.02c kṛṇoṣi tam martyeṣu praśastaṃ jāto-jāto jāyate vājy asya //
analyzed: kṛṇoṣi tam martyeṣu praśastam jātaḥ jātaḥ jāyate vājī asya

original: RV_7,090.03a rāye nu yaṃ jajñatū rodasīme rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam /
analyzed: rāye nu yam jajñatuḥ rodasī ime rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam

original: RV_7,090.03c adha vāyuṃ niyutaḥ saścata svā uta śvetaṃ vasudhitiṃ nireke //
analyzed: adha vāyum niyutaḥ saścata svāḥ uta śvetam vasu dhitim nireke

original: RV_7,090.04a ucchann uṣasaḥ sudinā ariprā uru jyotir vividur dīdhyānāḥ /
analyzed: ucchan uṣasaḥ su dināḥ ariprāḥ uru jyotiḥ vividuḥ dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_7,090.04c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam uśijo vi vavrus teṣām anu pradivaḥ sasrur āpaḥ //
analyzed: gavyam cit ūrvam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ teṣām anu pradivaḥ sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_7,090.05a te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti /
analyzed: te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti

original: RV_7,090.05c indravāyū vīravāhaṃ rathaṃ vām īśānayor abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante //
analyzed: indra vāyū vīra vāham ratham vām īśānayoḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante

original: RV_7,090.06a īśānāso ye dadhate svar ṇo gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir hiraṇyaiḥ /
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ ye dadhate svar naḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ hiraṇyaiḥ

original: RV_7,090.06c indravāyū sūrayo viśvam āyur arvadbhir vīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ //
analyzed: indra vāyū sūrayaḥ viśvam āyuḥ arvadbhiḥ vīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ

original: RV_7,090.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasaḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ indra vāyū suṣṭutibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,090.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vājayantaḥ su avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,091.01a kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devāḥ anavadyāsaḥ āsan

original: RV_7,091.01c te vāyave manave bādhitāyāvāsayann uṣasaṃ sūryeṇa //
analyzed: te vāyave manave bādhitāya avāsayan uṣasam sūryeṇa

original: RV_7,091.02a uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaś ca pāthaḥ śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaḥ ca pāthaḥ śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ

original: RV_7,091.02c indravāyū suṣṭutir vām iyānā mārḍīkam īṭṭe suvitaṃ ca navyam //
analyzed: indra vāyū suṣṭutiḥ vām iyānā mārḍīkam īṭṭe suvitam ca navyam

original: RV_7,091.03a pīvoannāṃ rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ /
analyzed: pīvaḥ annām rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ

original: RV_7,091.03c te vāyave samanaso vi tasthur viśven naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ //
analyzed: te vāyave samanasaḥ vi tasthuḥ viśvā id naraḥ su apatyāni cakruḥ

original: RV_7,091.04a yāvat taras tanvo yāvad ojo yāvan naraś cakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ /
analyzed: yāvat taraḥ tanvaḥ yāvat ojaḥ yāvat naraḥ cakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_7,091.04c śuciṃ somaṃ śucipā pātam asme indravāyū sadatam barhir edam //
analyzed: śucim somam śuci pā pātam asme indra vāyū sadatam barhiḥ ā idam

original: RV_7,091.05a niyuvānā niyuta spārhavīrā indravāyū sarathaṃ yātam arvāk /
analyzed: niyuvānā niyutaḥ spārha vīrāḥ indra vāyū sa ratham yātam arvāk

original: RV_7,091.05c idaṃ hi vām prabhṛtam madhvo agram adha prīṇānā vi mumuktam asme //
analyzed: idam hi vām prabhṛtam madhvaḥ agram adha prīṇānā vi mumuktam asme

original: RV_7,091.06a yā vāṃ śataṃ niyuto yāḥ sahasram indravāyū viśvavārāḥ sacante /
analyzed: yāḥ vām śatam niyutaḥ yāḥ sahasram indra vāyū viśva vārāḥ sacante

original: RV_7,091.06c ābhir yātaṃ suvidatrābhir arvāk pātaṃ narā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ //
analyzed: ābhiḥ yātam suvidatrābhiḥ arvāk pātam narā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_7,091.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasaḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ indra vāyū suṣṭutibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_7,091.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vājayantaḥ su avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,092.01a ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā upa naḥ sahasraṃ te niyuto viśvavāra /
analyzed: ā vāyo bhūṣa śuci pāḥ upa naḥ sahasram te niyutaḥ viśva vāra

original: RV_7,092.01c upo te andho madyam ayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam //
analyzed: upa u te andhaḥ madyam ayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam

original: RV_7,092.02a pra sotā jīro adhvareṣv asthāt somam indrāya vāyave pibadhyai /
analyzed: pra sotā jīraḥ adhvareṣu asthāt somam indrāya vāyave pibadhyai

original: RV_7,092.02c pra yad vām madhvo agriyam bharanty adhvaryavo devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: pra yat vām madhvaḥ agriyam bharanti adhvaryavaḥ devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_7,092.03a pra yābhir yāsi dāśvāṃsam acchā niyudbhir vāyav iṣṭaye duroṇe /
analyzed: pra yābhiḥ yāsi dāśvāṃsam acchā niyudbhiḥ vāyo iṣṭaye duroṇe

original: RV_7,092.03c ni no rayiṃ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyam aśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ //
analyzed: ni naḥ rayim su bhojasam yuvasva ni vīram gavyam aśvyam ca rādhaḥ

original: RV_7,092.04a ye vāyava indramādanāsa ādevāso nitośanāso aryaḥ /
analyzed: ye vāyavaḥ indra mādanāsaḥ ādevāsaḥ nitośanāsaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_7,092.04c ghnanto vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ ṣyāma sāsahvāṃso yudhā nṛbhir amitrān //
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ syāma sāsahvāṃsaḥ yudhā nṛbhiḥ amitrān

original: RV_7,092.05a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi yajñam /
analyzed: ā naḥ niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiḥ adhvaram sahasriṇībhiḥ upa yāhi yajñam

original: RV_7,092.05c vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,093.01a śuciṃ nu stomaṃ navajātam adyendrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: śucim nu stomam nava jātam adyā indra agnī vṛtra haṇā juṣethām

original: RV_7,093.01c ubhā hi vāṃ suhavā johavīmi tā vājaṃ sadya uśate dheṣṭhā //
analyzed: ubhā hi vām su havā johavīmi tā vājam sadyas uśate dheṣṭhā

original: RV_7,093.02a tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtaṃ sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā /
analyzed: tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtam sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā

original: RV_7,093.02c kṣayantau rāyo yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktaṃ vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ //
analyzed: kṣayantau rāyaḥ yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktam vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ

original: RV_7,093.03a upo ha yad vidathaṃ vājino gur dhībhir viprāḥ pramatim icchamānāḥ /
analyzed: upa u ha yat vidatham vājinaḥ guḥ dhībhiḥ viprāḥ pramatim icchamānāḥ

original: RV_7,093.03c arvanto na kāṣṭhāṃ nakṣamāṇā indrāgnī johuvato naras te //
analyzed: arvantaḥ na kāṣṭhām nakṣamāṇāḥ indra agnī johuvataḥ naraḥ te

original: RV_7,093.04a gīrbhir vipraḥ pramatim icchamāna īṭṭe rayiṃ yaśasam pūrvabhājam /
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ pramatim icchamānaḥ īṭṭe rayim yaśasam pūrvabhājam

original: RV_7,093.04c indrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā suvajrā pra no navyebhis tirataṃ deṣṇaiḥ //
analyzed: indra agnī vṛtra haṇā su vajrā pra naḥ navyebhiḥ tiratam deṣṇaiḥ

original: RV_7,093.05a saṃ yan mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite /
analyzed: sam yat mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite

original: RV_7,093.05c adevayuṃ vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hataṃ somasutā janena //
analyzed: adevayum vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hatam soma sutā janena

original: RV_7,093.06a imām u ṣu somasutim upa na endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam /
analyzed: imām u su soma sutim upa naḥ ā indra agnī saumanasāya yātam

original: RV_7,093.06c nū cid dhi parimamnāthe asmān ā vāṃ śaśvadbhir vavṛtīya vājaiḥ //
analyzed: nu cit hi parimamnāthe asmān ā vām śaśvadbhiḥ vavṛtīya vājaiḥ

original: RV_7,093.07a so agna enā namasā samiddho 'cchā mitraṃ varuṇam indraṃ voceḥ /
analyzed: saḥ agne enā namasā samiddhaḥ acchā mitram varuṇam indram voceḥ

original: RV_7,093.07c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷa tad aryamāditiḥ śiśrathantu //
analyzed: yat sīm āgaḥ cakṛma tat su mṛḍa tat aryamā aditiḥ śiśrathantu

original: RV_7,093.08a etā agna āśuṣāṇāsa iṣṭīr yuvoḥ sacābhy aśyāma vājān /
analyzed: etāḥ agne āśuṣāṇāsaḥ iṣṭīḥ yuvoḥ sacā abhi aśyāma vājān

original: RV_7,093.08c mendro no viṣṇur marutaḥ pari khyan yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: mā indraḥ naḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ pari khyan yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,094.01a iyaṃ vām asya manmana indrāgnī pūrvyastutiḥ /
analyzed: iyam vām asya manmanaḥ indra agnī pūrvya stutiḥ

original: RV_7,094.01c abhrād vṛṣṭir ivājani //
analyzed: abhrāt vṛṣṭiḥ iva ajani

original: RV_7,094.02a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havam indrāgnī vanataṃ giraḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇutam jarituḥ havam indra agnī vanatam giraḥ

original: RV_7,094.02c īśānā pipyataṃ dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: īśānā pipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_7,094.03a mā pāpatvāya no narendrāgnī mābhiśastaye /
analyzed: mā pāpa tvāya naḥ nara indra agnī mā abhiśastaye

original: RV_7,094.03c mā no rīradhataṃ nide //
analyzed: mā naḥ rīradhatam nide

original: RV_7,094.04a indre agnā namo bṛhat suvṛktim erayāmahe /
analyzed: indre agnā namaḥ bṛhat suvṛktim erayāmahe

original: RV_7,094.04c dhiyā dhenā avasyavaḥ //
analyzed: dhiyā dhenāḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_7,094.05a tā hi śaśvanta īḷata itthā viprāsa ūtaye /
analyzed: tā hi śaśvantaḥ īḍate itthā viprāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_7,094.05c sabādho vājasātaye //
analyzed: sabādhaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_7,094.06a tā vāṃ gīrbhir vipanyavaḥ prayasvanto havāmahe /
analyzed: tā vām gīrbhiḥ vipanyavaḥ prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_7,094.06c medhasātā saniṣyavaḥ //
analyzed: medha sātā saniṣyavaḥ

original: RV_7,094.07a indrāgnī avasā gatam asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahā /
analyzed: indra agnī avasā gatam asmabhyam carṣaṇī sahā

original: RV_7,094.07c mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata //
analyzed: mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_7,094.08a mā kasya no araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya /
analyzed: mā kasya naḥ a raruṣaḥ dhūrtiḥ praṇak martyasya

original: RV_7,094.08c indrāgnī śarma yacchatam //
analyzed: indra agnī śarma yacchatam

original: RV_7,094.09a gomad dhiraṇyavad vasu yad vām aśvāvad īmahe /
analyzed: gomat hiraṇyavat vasu yat vām aśvāvat īmahe

original: RV_7,094.09c indrāgnī tad vanemahi //
analyzed: indra agnī tat vanemahi

original: RV_7,094.10a yat soma ā sute nara indrāgnī ajohavuḥ /
analyzed: yat some ā sute naraḥ indra agnī ajohavuḥ

original: RV_7,094.10c saptīvantā saparyavaḥ //
analyzed: saptīvantā saparyavaḥ

original: RV_7,094.11a ukthebhir vṛtrahantamā yā mandānā cid ā girā /
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ vṛtra hantamā yā mandānā cit ā girā

original: RV_7,094.11c āṅgūṣair āvivāsataḥ //
analyzed: āṅgūṣaiḥ āvivāsataḥ

original: RV_7,094.12a tāv id duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ durvidvāṃsaṃ rakṣasvinam /
analyzed: tau id duḥśaṃsam martyam durvidvāṃsam rakṣasvinam

original: RV_7,094.12c ābhogaṃ hanmanā hatam udadhiṃ hanmanā hatam //
analyzed: ābhogam hanmanā hatam udadhim hanmanā hatam

original: RV_7,095.01a pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasra eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇam āyasī pūḥ /
analyzed: pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasre eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇam āyasī pūḥ

original: RV_7,095.01c prabābadhānā rathyeva yāti viśvā apo mahinā sindhur anyāḥ //
analyzed: prabābadhānā rathyā iva yāti viśvāḥ apaḥ mahinā sindhuḥ anyāḥ

original: RV_7,095.02a ekācetat sarasvatī nadīnāṃ śucir yatī giribhya ā samudrāt /
analyzed: ekā acetat sarasvatī nadīnām śuciḥ yatī giribhyaḥ ā samudrāt

original: RV_7,095.02c rāyaś cetantī bhuvanasya bhūrer ghṛtam payo duduhe nāhuṣāya //
analyzed: rāyaḥ cetantī bhuvanasya bhūreḥ ghṛtam payaḥ duduhe nāhuṣāya

original: RV_7,095.03a sa vāvṛdhe naryo yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśur vṛṣabho yajñiyāsu /
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhe naryaḥ yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśuḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yajñiyāsu

original: RV_7,095.03c sa vājinam maghavadbhyo dadhāti vi sātaye tanvam māmṛjīta //
analyzed: sa vājinam maghavadbhyaḥ dadhāti vi sātaye tanvam māmṛjīta

original: RV_7,095.04a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇopa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin /
analyzed: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇā upa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin

original: RV_7,095.04c mitajñubhir namasyair iyānā rāyā yujā cid uttarā sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: mitajñubhiḥ namasyaiḥ iyānāḥ rāyā yujā cit uttarā sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_7,095.05a imā juhvānā yuṣmad ā namobhiḥ prati stomaṃ sarasvati juṣasva /
analyzed: imā juhvānā yuṣmat ā namobhiḥ prati stomam sarasvati juṣasva

original: RV_7,095.05c tava śarman priyatame dadhānā upa stheyāma śaraṇaṃ na vṛkṣam //
analyzed: tava śarman priyatame dadhānāḥ upa stheyāma śaraṇam na vṛkṣam

original: RV_7,095.06a ayam u te sarasvati vasiṣṭho dvārāv ṛtasya subhage vy āvaḥ /
analyzed: ayam u te sarasvati vasiṣṭhaḥ dvārau ṛtasya subhage vi āvaḥ

original: RV_7,095.06c vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,096.01a bṛhad u gāyiṣe vaco 'suryā nadīnām /
analyzed: bṛhat u gāyiṣe vacaḥ asuryā nadīnām

original: RV_7,096.01c sarasvatīm in mahayā suvṛktibhi stomair vasiṣṭha rodasī //
analyzed: sarasvatīm id mahaya suvṛktibhiḥ stomaiḥ vasiṣṭha rodasī

original: RV_7,096.02a ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ /
analyzed: ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ

original: RV_7,096.02c sā no bodhy avitrī marutsakhā coda rādho maghonām //
analyzed: sā naḥ bodhi avitrī marut sakhā coda rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_7,096.03a bhadram id bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvaty akavārī cetati vājinīvatī /
analyzed: bhadram id bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvatī a kavārī cetati vājinīvatī

original: RV_7,096.03c gṛṇānā jamadagnivat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭhavat //
analyzed: gṛṇānā jamadagni vat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭha vat

original: RV_7,096.04a janīyanto nv agravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: janīyantaḥ nu agravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_7,096.04c sarasvantaṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: sarasvantam havāmahe

original: RV_7,096.05a ye te sarasva ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ /
analyzed: ye te sarasvas ūrmayaḥ madhumantaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: RV_7,096.05c tebhir no 'vitā bhava //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ avitā bhava

original: RV_7,096.06a pīpivāṃsaṃ sarasvata stanaṃ yo viśvadarśataḥ /
analyzed: pīpivāṃsam sarasvataḥ stanam yaḥ viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_7,096.06c bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam //
analyzed: bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam

original: RV_7,097.01a yajñe divo nṛṣadane pṛthivyā naro yatra devayavo madanti /
analyzed: yajñe divaḥ nṛṣadane pṛthivyāḥ naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti

original: RV_7,097.01c indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gaman madāya prathamaṃ vayaś ca //
analyzed: indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gamat madāya prathamam vayaḥ ca

original: RV_7,097.02a ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe 'vāṃsi bṛhaspatir no maha ā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe avāṃsi bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ mahaḥ ā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_7,097.02c yathā bhavema mīḷhuṣe anāgā yo no dātā parāvataḥ piteva //
analyzed: yathā bhavema mīḍhuṣe anāgāḥ yaḥ naḥ dātā parāvataḥ pitā iva

original: RV_7,097.03a tam u jyeṣṭhaṃ namasā havirbhiḥ suśevam brahmaṇas patiṃ gṛṇīṣe /
analyzed: tam u jyeṣṭham namasā havirbhiḥ su śevam brahmaṇaḥ patim gṛṇīṣe

original: RV_7,097.03c indraṃ śloko mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yo brahmaṇo devakṛtasya rājā //
analyzed: indram ślokaḥ mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ deva kṛtasya rājā

original: RV_7,097.04a sa ā no yoniṃ sadatu preṣṭho bṛhaspatir viśvavāro yo asti /
analyzed: saḥ ā naḥ yonim sadatu preṣṭhaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ viśva vāraḥ yaḥ asti

original: RV_7,097.04c kāmo rāyaḥ suvīryasya taṃ dāt parṣan no ati saścato ariṣṭān //
analyzed: kāmaḥ rāyaḥ su vīryasya tam dāt parṣat naḥ ati saścataḥ ariṣṭān

original: RV_7,097.05a tam ā no arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsur amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ /
analyzed: tam ā naḥ arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsuḥ amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ

original: RV_7,097.05c śucikrandaṃ yajatam pastyānām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇaṃ huvema //
analyzed: śuci krandam yajatam pastyānām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇam huvema

original: RV_7,097.06a taṃ śagmāso aruṣāso aśvā bṛhaspatiṃ sahavāho vahanti /
analyzed: tam śagmāsaḥ aruṣāsaḥ aśvāḥ bṛhaspatim sahavāhaḥ vahanti

original: RV_7,097.06c sahaś cid yasya nīlavat sadhasthaṃ nabho na rūpam aruṣaṃ vasānāḥ //
analyzed: sahaḥ cit yasya nīlavat sadhastham nabhaḥ na rūpam aruṣam vasānāḥ

original: RV_7,097.07a sa hi śuciḥ śatapatraḥ sa śundhyur hiraṇyavāśīr iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ /
analyzed: sa hi śuciḥ śata patraḥ sa śundhyuḥ hiraṇya vāśīḥ iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ

original: RV_7,097.07c bṛhaspatiḥ sa svāveśa ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhya āsutiṃ kariṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa su āveśaḥ ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhyaḥ āsutim kariṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_7,097.08a devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatiṃ vāvṛdhatur mahitvā /
analyzed: devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatim vāvṛdhatuḥ mahitvā

original: RV_7,097.08c dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karad brahmaṇe sutarā sugādhā //
analyzed: dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karat brahmaṇe sutarā su gādhā

original: RV_7,097.09a iyaṃ vām brahmaṇas pate suvṛktir brahmendrāya vajriṇe akāri /
analyzed: iyam vām brahmaṇaḥ pate suvṛktiḥ brahma indrāya vajriṇe akāri

original: RV_7,097.09c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ //
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam purandhīḥ jajastam aryaḥ vanuṣām arātīḥ

original: RV_7,097.10a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya

original: RV_7,097.10c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,098.01a adhvaryavo 'ruṇaṃ dugdham aṃśuṃ juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām /
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ aruṇam dugdham aṃśum juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām

original: RV_7,098.01c gaurād vedīyāṃ avapānam indro viśvāhed yāti sutasomam icchan //
analyzed: gaurāt vedīyān avapānam indraḥ viśvāhā id yāti suta somam icchan

original: RV_7,098.02a yad dadhiṣe pradivi cārv annaṃ dive-dive pītim id asya vakṣi /
analyzed: yat dadhiṣe pradivi cāru annam dive dive pītim id asya vakṣi

original: RV_7,098.02c uta hṛdota manasā juṣāṇa uśann indra prasthitān pāhi somān //
analyzed: uta hṛdā uta manasā juṣāṇaḥ uśan indra prasthitān pāhi somān

original: RV_7,098.03a jajñānaḥ somaṃ sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca /
analyzed: jajñānaḥ somam sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca

original: RV_7,098.03c endra paprāthorv antarikṣaṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha //
analyzed: ā indra paprātha uru antarikṣam yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha

original: RV_7,098.04a yad yodhayā mahato manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān /
analyzed: yat yodhayā mahataḥ manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān

original: RV_7,098.04c yad vā nṛbhir vṛta indrābhiyudhyās taṃ tvayājiṃ sauśravasaṃ jayema //
analyzed: yat vā nṛbhiḥ vṛtaḥ indra abhiyudhyāḥ tam tvayā ājim sauśravasam jayema

original: RV_7,098.05a prendrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra /
analyzed: pra indrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra

original: RV_7,098.05c yaded adevīr asahiṣṭa māyā athābhavat kevalaḥ somo asya //
analyzed: yadā id adevīḥ asahiṣṭa māyāḥ atha abhavat kevalaḥ somaḥ asya

original: RV_7,098.06a tavedaṃ viśvam abhitaḥ paśavyaṃ yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya /
analyzed: tava idam viśvam abhitas paśavyam yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya

original: RV_7,098.06c gavām asi gopatir eka indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ //
analyzed: gavām asi go patiḥ ekaḥ indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ

original: RV_7,098.07a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya

original: RV_7,098.07c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,099.01a paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anv aśnuvanti /
analyzed: paras mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anu aśnuvanti

original: RV_7,099.01c ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse //
analyzed: ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyāḥ viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse

original: RV_7,099.02a na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa /
analyzed: na te viṣṇo jāyamānaḥ na jātaḥ deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa

original: RV_7,099.02c ud astabhnā nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubham pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: ud astabhnāḥ nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantam dādhartha prācīm kakubham pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_7,099.03a irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtaṃ sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā /
analyzed: irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtam sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā

original: RV_7,099.03c vy astabhnā rodasī viṣṇav ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhito mayūkhaiḥ //
analyzed: vi astabhnāḥ rodasī viṣṇo ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhitas mayūkhaiḥ

original: RV_7,099.04a uruṃ yajñāya cakrathur u lokaṃ janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim /
analyzed: urum yajñāya cakrathuḥ u lokam janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim

original: RV_7,099.04c dāsasya cid vṛṣaśiprasya māyā jaghnathur narā pṛtanājyeṣu //
analyzed: dāsasya cit vṛṣaśiprasya māyāḥ jaghnathuḥ narā pṛtanājyeṣu

original: RV_7,099.05a indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puro navatiṃ ca śnathiṣṭam /
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puraḥ navatim ca śnathiṣṭam

original: RV_7,099.05c śataṃ varcinaḥ sahasraṃ ca sākaṃ hatho apraty asurasya vīrān //
analyzed: śatam varcinaḥ sahasram ca sākam hathaḥ aprati asurasya vīrān

original: RV_7,099.06a iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantorukramā tavasā vardhayantī /
analyzed: iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantā uru kramā tavasā vardhayantī

original: RV_7,099.06c rare vāṃ stomaṃ vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣo vṛjaneṣv indra //
analyzed: rare vām stomam vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣaḥ vṛjaneṣu indra

original: RV_7,099.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te viṣṇo āsaḥ ā kṛṇomi tat me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam

original: RV_7,099.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,100.01a nū marto dayate saniṣyan yo viṣṇava urugāyāya dāśat /
analyzed: nu martaḥ dayate saniṣyan yaḥ viṣṇave urugāyāya dāśat

original: RV_7,100.01c pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāta etāvantaṃ naryam āvivāsāt //
analyzed: pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāte etāvantam naryam āvivāsāt

original: RV_7,100.02a tvaṃ viṣṇo sumatiṃ viśvajanyām aprayutām evayāvo matiṃ dāḥ /
analyzed: tvam viṣṇo sumatim viśvajanyām aprayutām eva yāvaḥ matim dāḥ

original: RV_7,100.02c parco yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūrer aśvāvataḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ //
analyzed: parcaḥ yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūreḥ aśvāvataḥ puru ścandrasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_7,100.03a trir devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā /
analyzed: tris devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣaḥ etām vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā

original: RV_7,100.03c pra viṣṇur astu tavasas tavīyān tveṣaṃ hy asya sthavirasya nāma //
analyzed: pra viṣṇuḥ astu tavasaḥ tavīyān tveṣam hi asya sthavirasya nāma

original: RV_7,100.04a vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ kṣetrāya viṣṇur manuṣe daśasyan /
analyzed: vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣaḥ etām kṣetrāya viṣṇuḥ manuṣe daśasyan

original: RV_7,100.04c dhruvāso asya kīrayo janāsa urukṣitiṃ sujanimā cakāra //
analyzed: dhruvāsaḥ asya kīrayaḥ janāsaḥ uru kṣitim su janimā cakāra

original: RV_7,100.05a pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāmāryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān /
analyzed: pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāma aryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān

original: RV_7,100.05c taṃ tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam atavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke //
analyzed: tam tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam a tavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke

original: RV_7,100.06a kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yad vavakṣe śipiviṣṭo asmi /
analyzed: kim id te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yat vavakṣe śipiviṣṭaḥ asmi

original: RV_7,100.06c mā varpo asmad apa gūha etad yad anyarūpaḥ samithe babhūtha //
analyzed: mā varpaḥ asmat apa gūha etat yat anya rūpaḥ samithe babhūtha

original: RV_7,100.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te viṣṇo āsaḥ ā kṛṇomi tat me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam

original: RV_7,100.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,101.01a tisro vācaḥ pra vada jyotiragrā yā etad duhre madhudogham ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ pra vada jyotiḥ agrāḥ yāḥ etat duhre madhu dogham ūdhaḥ

original: RV_7,101.01c sa vatsaṃ kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnāṃ sadyo jāto vṛṣabho roravīti //
analyzed: sa vatsam kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnām sadyas jātaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_7,101.02a yo vardhana oṣadhīnāṃ yo apāṃ yo viśvasya jagato deva īśe /
analyzed: yaḥ vardhanaḥ oṣadhīnām yaḥ apām yaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ devaḥ īśe

original: RV_7,101.02c sa tridhātu śaraṇaṃ śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ svabhiṣṭy asme //
analyzed: sa tri dhātu śaraṇam śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ su abhiṣṭi asme

original: RV_7,101.03a starīr u tvad bhavati sūta u tvad yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ /
analyzed: starīḥ u tvat bhavati sūte u tvat yathāvaśam tanvam cakre eṣaḥ

original: RV_7,101.03c pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena putraḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena putraḥ

original: RV_7,101.04a yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthus tisro dyāvas tredhā sasrur āpaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ tisraḥ dyāvaḥ tredhā sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_7,101.04c trayaḥ kośāsa upasecanāso madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam //
analyzed: trayaḥ kośāsaḥ upasecanāsaḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam

original: RV_7,101.05a idaṃ vacaḥ parjanyāya svarāje hṛdo astv antaraṃ taj jujoṣat /
analyzed: idam vacaḥ parjanyāya sva rāje hṛdaḥ astu antaram tat jujoṣat

original: RV_7,101.05c mayobhuvo vṛṣṭayaḥ santv asme supippalā oṣadhīr devagopāḥ //
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ santu asme su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ deva gopāḥ

original: RV_7,101.06a sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnāṃ tasminn ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca /
analyzed: sa retaḥ dhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām tasmin ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca

original: RV_7,101.06c tan ma ṛtam pātu śataśāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: tat me ṛtam pātu śata śāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_7,102.01a parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḷhuṣe /
analyzed: parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḍhuṣe

original: RV_7,102.01c sa no yavasam icchatu //
analyzed: sa naḥ yavasam icchatu

original: RV_7,102.02a yo garbham oṣadhīnāṃ gavāṃ kṛṇoty arvatām /
analyzed: yaḥ garbham oṣadhīnām gavām kṛṇoti arvatām

original: RV_7,102.02c parjanyaḥ puruṣīṇām //
analyzed: parjanyaḥ puruṣīṇām

original: RV_7,102.03a tasmā id āsye havir juhotā madhumattamam /
analyzed: tasmai id āsye haviḥ juhota madhumattamam

original: RV_7,102.03c iḷāṃ naḥ saṃyataṃ karat //
analyzed: iḷām naḥ saṃyatam karat

original: RV_7,103.01a saṃvatsaraṃ śaśayānā brāhmaṇā vratacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsaram śaśayānāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vrata cāriṇaḥ

original: RV_7,103.01c vācam parjanyajinvitām pra maṇḍūkā avādiṣuḥ //
analyzed: vācam parjanya jinvitām pra maṇḍūkāḥ avādiṣuḥ

original: RV_7,103.02a divyā āpo abhi yad enam āyan dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
analyzed: divyāḥ āpaḥ abhi yat enam āyan dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam

original: RV_7,103.02c gavām aha na māyur vatsinīnām maṇḍūkānāṃ vagnur atrā sam eti //
analyzed: gavām aha na māyuḥ vatsinīnām maṇḍūkānām vagnuḥ atrā sam eti

original: RV_7,103.03a yad īm enāṃ uśato abhy avarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣy āgatāyām /
analyzed: yat īm enām uśataḥ abhī avarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣi āgatāyām

original: RV_7,103.03c akhkhalīkṛtyā pitaraṃ na putro anyo anyam upa vadantam eti //
analyzed: akhkhalīkṛtya pitaram na putraḥ anyaḥ anyam upa vadantam eti

original: RV_7,103.04a anyo anyam anu gṛbhṇāty enor apām prasarge yad amandiṣātām /
analyzed: anyaḥ anyam anu gṛbhṇāti enoḥ apām prasarge yat amandiṣātām

original: RV_7,103.04c maṇḍūko yad abhivṛṣṭaḥ kaniṣkan pṛśniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam //
analyzed: maṇḍūkaḥ yat abhivṛṣṭaḥ kaniṣkan pṛśniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam

original: RV_7,103.05a yad eṣām anyo anyasya vācaṃ śāktasyeva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yat eṣām anyaḥ anyasya vācam śāktasya iva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_7,103.05c sarvaṃ tad eṣāṃ samṛdheva parva yat suvāco vadathanādhy apsu //
analyzed: sarvam tat eṣām samṛdhā iva parva yat su vācaḥ vadathana adhi apsu

original: RV_7,103.06a gomāyur eko ajamāyur ekaḥ pṛśnir eko harita eka eṣām /
analyzed: go māyuḥ ekaḥ aja māyuḥ ekaḥ pṛśniḥ ekaḥ haritaḥ ekaḥ eṣām

original: RV_7,103.06c samānaṃ nāma bibhrato virūpāḥ purutrā vācam pipiśur vadantaḥ //
analyzed: samānam nāma bibhrataḥ virūpāḥ purutrā vācam pipiśuḥ vadantaḥ

original: RV_7,103.07a brāhmaṇāso atirātre na some saro na pūrṇam abhito vadantaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ atirātre na some saraḥ na pūrṇam abhitas vadantaḥ

original: RV_7,103.07c saṃvatsarasya tad ahaḥ pari ṣṭha yan maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇam babhūva //
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya tat ahar pari stha yat maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇam babhūva

original: RV_7,103.08a brāhmaṇāsaḥ somino vācam akrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ sominaḥ vācam akrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam

original: RV_7,103.08c adhvaryavo gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānā āvir bhavanti guhyā na ke cit //
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānāḥ āvis bhavanti guhyāḥ na ke cit

original: RV_7,103.09a devahitiṃ jugupur dvādaśasya ṛtuṃ naro na pra minanty ete /
analyzed: deva hitim jugupuḥ dvādaśasya ṛtum naraḥ na pra minanti ete

original: RV_7,103.09c saṃvatsare prāvṛṣy āgatāyāṃ taptā gharmā aśnuvate visargam //
analyzed: saṃvatsare prāvṛṣi āgatāyām taptāḥ gharmāḥ aśnuvate visargam

original: RV_7,103.10a gomāyur adād ajamāyur adāt pṛśnir adād dharito no vasūni /
analyzed: go māyuḥ adāt aja māyuḥ adāt pṛśniḥ adāt haritaḥ naḥ vasūni

original: RV_7,103.10c gavām maṇḍūkā dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ //
