analyzed: gavām maṇḍūkāḥ dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_7,104.01a indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam ni arpayatam vṛṣaṇā tamaḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_7,104.01c parā śṛṇītam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ //
analyzed: parā śṛṇītam acitaḥ ni oṣatam hatam nudethām ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ

original: RV_7,104.02a indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnivāṃ iva /
analyzed: indrāsomā sam agha śaṃsam abhī agham tapuḥ yayastu caruḥ agnivān iva

original: RV_7,104.02c brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ kimīdine //
analyzed: brahma dviṣe kravya ade ghora cakṣase dveṣaḥ dhattam anavāyam kimīdine

original: RV_7,104.03a indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam /
analyzed: indrāsomā duṣkṛtaḥ vavre antar an ārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam

original: RV_7,104.03c yathā nātaḥ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ //
analyzed: yathā na atas punar ekaḥ cana udayat tat vām astu sahase manyumat śavaḥ

original: RV_7,104.04a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ sam pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam /
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ vadham sam pṛthivyāḥ agha śaṃsāya tarhaṇam

original: RV_7,104.04c ut takṣataṃ svaryam parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ //
analyzed: ud takṣatam svaryam parvatebhyaḥ yena rakṣaḥ vāvṛdhānam nijūrvathaḥ

original: RV_7,104.05a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam aśmahanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ pari agni taptebhiḥ yuvam aśma hanmabhiḥ

original: RV_7,104.05c tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir atriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram //
analyzed: tapuḥ vadhebhiḥ ajarebhiḥ atriṇaḥ ni parśāne vidhyatam yantu nisvaram

original: RV_7,104.06a indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvata iyam matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā /
analyzed: indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvatas iyam matiḥ kakṣyā aśvā iva vājinā

original: RV_7,104.06c yāṃ vāṃ hotrām parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam //
analyzed: yām vām hotrām parihinomi medhayā imā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam

original: RV_7,104.07a prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ /
analyzed: prati smarethām tujayadbhiḥ evaiḥ hatam druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ

original: RV_7,104.07c indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūd yo naḥ kadā cid abhidāsati druhā //
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūt yaḥ naḥ kadā cit abhidāsati druhā

original: RV_7,104.08a yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhiḥ vacobhiḥ

original: RV_7,104.08c āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asann astv āsata indra vaktā //
analyzed: āpaḥ iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītāḥ asan astu asataḥ indra vaktā

original: RV_7,104.09a ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: ye pāka śaṃsam viharante evaiḥ ye vā bhadram dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_7,104.09c ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upasthe //
analyzed: ahaye vā tān pradadātu somaḥ ā vā dadhātu nirṛteḥ upasthe

original: RV_7,104.10a yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yas tanūnām /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ rasam dipsati pitvaḥ agne yaḥ aśvānām yaḥ gavām yaḥ tanūnām

original: RV_7,104.10c ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca //
analyzed: ripuḥ stenaḥ steya kṛt dabhram etu ni sa hīyatām tanvā tanā ca

original: RV_7,104.11a paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ /
analyzed: paras saḥ astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ adhas astu viśvāḥ

original: RV_7,104.11c prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo no divā dipsati yaś ca naktam //
analyzed: prati śuṣyatu yaśaḥ asya devāḥ yaḥ naḥ divā dipsati yaḥ ca naktam

original: RV_7,104.12a suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛdhāte /
analyzed: su vijñānam cikituṣe janāya sat ca asat ca vacasī paspṛdhāte

original: RV_7,104.12c tayor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty āsat //
analyzed: tayoḥ yat satyam yatarad ṛjīyaḥ tat id somaḥ avati hanti asat

original: RV_7,104.13a na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam /
analyzed: na vai u somaḥ vṛjinam hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam

original: RV_7,104.13c hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte //
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ hanti asat vadantam ubhau indrasya prasitau śayāte

original: RV_7,104.14a yadi vāham anṛtadeva āsa moghaṃ vā devāṃ apyūhe agne /
analyzed: yadi vā aham anṛta devaḥ āsa mogham vā devān api ūhe agne

original: RV_7,104.14c kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām //
analyzed: kim asmabhyam jātavedaḥ hṛṇīṣe drogha vācaḥ te nirṛtham sacantām

original: RV_7,104.15a adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa pūruṣasya /
analyzed: adya murīya yadi yātudhānaḥ asmi yadi vā āyuḥ tatapa pūruṣasya

original: RV_7,104.15c adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety āha //
analyzed: adhā sa vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ vi yūyāḥ yaḥ mā mogham yātudhāna iti āha

original: RV_7,104.16a yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo vā rakṣāḥ śucir asmīty āha /
analyzed: yaḥ mā a yātum yātudhāna iti āha yaḥ vā rakṣāḥ śuciḥ asmi iti āha

original: RV_7,104.16c indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa //
analyzed: indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoḥ adhamaḥ padīṣṭa

original: RV_7,104.17a pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhā tanvaṃ gūhamānā /
analyzed: pra yā jigāti khargalā iva naktam apa druhā tanvam gūhamānā

original: RV_7,104.17c vavrāṃ anantāṃ ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ //
analyzed: vavrām anantām ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇaḥ ghnantu rakṣasaḥ upabdaiḥ

original: RV_7,104.18a vi tiṣṭhadhvam maruto vikṣv icchata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭana /
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhadhvam marutaḥ vikṣu icchata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭana

original: RV_7,104.18c vayo ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare //
analyzed: vayaḥ ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhiḥ ye vā ripaḥ dadhire deve adhvare

original: RV_7,104.19a pra vartaya divo aśmānam indra somaśitam maghavan saṃ śiśādhi /
analyzed: pra vartaya divaḥ aśmānam indra soma śitam maghavan sam śiśādhi

original: RV_7,104.19c prāktād apāktād adharād udaktād abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena //
analyzed: prāktāt apāktāt adharāt udaktāt abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena

original: RV_7,104.20a eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam /
analyzed: ete u tye patayanti śvayātavaḥ indram dipsanti dipsavaḥ adābhyam

original: RV_7,104.20c śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //
analyzed: śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nūnam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ

original: RV_7,104.21a indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām /
analyzed: indraḥ yātūnām abhavat parāśaraḥ havirmathīnām abhi āvivāsatām

original: RV_7,104.21c abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanam pātreva bhindan sata eti rakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: abhi id u śakraḥ paraśuḥ yathā vanam pātrā iva bhindan satas eti rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_7,104.22a ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum /
analyzed: ulūka yātum śuśulūka yātum jahi śva yātum uta koka yātum

original: RV_7,104.22c suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra //
analyzed: suparṇa yātum uta gṛdhra yātum dṛṣadā iva pra mṛṇa rakṣaḥ indra

original: RV_7,104.23a mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatām apocchatu mithunā yā kimīdinā /
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ abhi naṭ yātumāvatām apocchatu mithunā yā kimīdinā

original: RV_7,104.23c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān //
analyzed: pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ antarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān

original: RV_7,104.24a indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām /
analyzed: indra jahi pumāṃsam yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām

original: RV_7,104.24c vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam //
analyzed: vigrīvāsaḥ mūradevāḥ ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_7,104.25a prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraś ca soma jāgṛtam /
analyzed: prati cakṣva vi cakṣva indraḥ ca soma jāgṛtam

original: RV_7,104.25c rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣobhyaḥ vadham asyatam aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ
